articles.title: 76% of Covid patients reported at least 1 ongoing symptom: Lancet - Daijiworld.com

Beijing, Jan 9 (IANS): A new study has found that more than three-quarters of Covid-19 patients have at least one ongoing symptom six months after initially becoming unwell.
